## CEDEFOP's dashboard for greenness and green pervasiveness in sectors
### Description

This dashboard presents trends in greenness and green pervasiveness over time and within selected sectors for a selected year/quarter. The word cloud displays the top 50 green skills for selected sectors, defined by ESCO v 1.1.1 and augmented by Cedefop.
